subject: Hello,
body:
Hello,
We Grant Loans to individuals and companies and we're interested in financing large-volume projects and grant loans without any delay, our interest rate will be 2% annually and repayment period is 1-15years + 6 months grace period. Our Loan process is collateral free. We also pay 1% commission to any broker, who introduces Project/Business owners to us for company,business and project loans or other opportunities.
We Offer Funding
* Project Finance Loan
* Business Loan
* Personal Loan
* Real Estates & Constructions
* Government Funding
Loan processing and financing takes about 8 working days from the day you submit your loan application .
Respond back for more information
Yours faithfully,
Financial Consultant On Project Finance-Spv.
Private Investment Finance-(PIF).
Foreign Direct Investment-(FDI).

subject: Re:   Hello,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I'm always interested in learning about different financing options. Can you please provide more details about the types of projects and businesses that you typically finance? Additionally, what are the specific requirements or qualifications for obtaining a loan from your organization?

I appreciate your time and look forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Luis

subject: Hello Luis Loan Processes
body:
Hello Luis

Thank you for your well-articulated email. The contents have been noted. In
respect to your application for a loan from Ezdan Holding Group to enable
you finance your project, please find below, our Loan Funding Procedures
and Processes.

The Ezdan Holding Group, a Qatar-based company, offers project loans to
private individuals and corporate organizations seeking expansion in their
various fields. Our project loan financing focuses on Business,
Construction, Industrial, Shopping & Retail, Information Technology, Oil &
Gas, Real Estate, Healthcare, Education, and Sports & Leisure.

We are ready and willing to fund projects outside Qatar in the form of Soft
Loans, and we grant corporate and private entities loans at a low and
affordable interest rate of 3% per annum.

The terms are also very flexible and exciting.

The Ezdan Holding Group has supported and funded so many projects since its
inception, and we urge you to familiarize yourself with the features of our
funding processes and procedures below:

    • Minimum/Maximum Funding: USD100, 000.00/5 Billion
USD/Euro/Pounds/Qatar Riyal
    • Placement Open to Entrepreneurs, Corporations, and Investors
    • Funding Type: Loan Investment
    • Funding Rate: 3% Interest Rate per annum
    • Duration: 1-15 years - Renewable Tenor
    • Currency: USD, Euros
    • Repayment: Quarterly Installments
    • Repayment Holiday: 1-2 years
    • Loan Collateral/ Security: Insurance Guarantee Bond Indemnity.

Before you are approved for the loan, you will be given an Application Form
to fill out and return to us with your Project Business Plan/Executive
Summary, along with other supporting documents as below:

    • Valid ID (International Passport or Driver's License) of the project
owner.

Certificate of Incorporation (not applicable for start-up business) to set
up a file for in-house consideration by the Ezdan Holding Group Investment
Committee.

Upon the approval of your loan request, the project owner will be
officially informed.

*REQUIRED COLLATERAL/SECURITY:*

If the loan is finally approved, the borrower will be contractually
obligated to come to our office for the closing of the loan deal and
signing of the MOU to confirm the collaboration of the Ezdan Holding Group
on the project proposition. Before closing and disbursement/transfer of
loan funding to a borrower's designated bank account.

If the requested loan is below a million dollars the borrower is required
to sign a contractual loan agreement with our attorney.

Therefore, if you agree with the above terms and conditions then prepare
your executive summary/business plan of the available projects and present
it to us for review by our Executive Board and Project Review Panel.

Also, send me an acknowledgment email and inform me to issue you our Loan
Application Form to fill out for further processing.

Thank you for partnering with Ezdan Holding Group. Best Regards.
Regards
Mr. Spencer
Financial Consultant On Project Finance-Spv.
Private Investment Finance-(PIF).
Foreign Direct Investment-(FDI).

subject: Re: Hello Luis Loan Processes
body:
Hello Mr. Spencer,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing information about the loan funding procedures and processes at Ezdan Holding Group. I appreciate your willingness to fund projects outside of Qatar and the flexible terms you offer.

I would like to learn more about the specific requirements for obtaining a loan from your company. Could you please provide some details on the collateral security that is required? Additionally, what are the typical timelines for loan approval and disbursement?

Furthermore, I would like to understand more about the types of projects that Ezdan Holding Group has previously funded. Could you share some examples or success stories?

Once I have gathered all the necessary information, I will prepare my executive summary business plan and submit it for review by your Executive Board and Project Review Panel.

Thank you again for considering my project. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Luis
